reviewText:
The Good Life - Complete Boxed Set ... My extended Family loves this show
you need a dvd player for Playback Region 2 :This will not play on most DVD players sold in the U.S., U.S. Territories, Canada, and Bermuda.
Great show.  Too bad its only four series.

Maybe everyone else knows this, but I didn't. You can't play British DVD's on an American DVD player. I can play them on my computer, and if it were legal I would burn copies to play on my DVD player. I'm not even sure if I could burn copies; there may be something that prevents it.
it was not some thing  i like  , but thats  just  my  opinion maybe  others would  like  it  but  i wasted  my  money  on this  one , it  bored  me  to sleep
Shown on PBS in the US as "Good Neighbors," this is excellent. I also enjoyed the extra included in the set.
